output: html_notebook

#Preliminaries
Load Libraries
```{r,message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

Define function
```{r}
fitfunc <- function(x,y)
{return(1/100*(x^2+y^2))}
```

#Function Running

```{r}
geneticPopulation(fitfunc,10,10,creation="new")
```


```{r}
geneticSpecies(fitfunc,species=10,gens=100,indivs=3,creation="child",plot="time")
```

```{r}
geneticSpecies(
  fitfunc,species=5,gens=100,indivs=3,creation="child",plot="maxVals")
```
